attributes.action: give Boris Johnson a major role in the Olympic opening ceremony.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those who have signed this petition believe that a perfect way to both keep down the costs of the olympic games opening ceremony, and ensure that millions would be delectably entertained is for Boris Johnson to perform the dance to the 'R n B' track 'Soulja Boy'. This would be a fitting tribute to his role as ambassador for London, and fully encapsulate our nation's idiosyncratic character. This petition is completely serious, and those who sign should wholeheartedly wish to see this performance as part of what will be an undoubtably memorable opening ceremony.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
